text: @HillaryClinton @maddow If USA had South Korean leader instead of incompetent Trump we would have about 1691 Covid19 (263 X 6.43) deaths instead of over 93,000. South Korea got their first case of Covid19 the same day as USA. They tested/traced/isolated immediately. They have 263 deaths @ 1/6.43 USA pop
